summary: Violent extremism and domestic terrorism continue to pose a threat to safety in the United States. This Snapshot highlights areas we've identified where federal agencies could improve how they prevent and counter such threats. title: Violent Extremism and Terrorism: Agencies Can Take Additional Steps to Counter Domestic Threats
